ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Provides R bindings to the 'Sundown' Markdown rendering library (<https://github.com/vmg/sundown>). Markdown is a plain-text formatting syntax that can be converted to 'XHTML' or other formats. See <http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown> for more information about Markdown.

Provides R bindings to the 'Sundown' Markdown rendering library (<https://github.com/vmg/sundown>). Markdown is a plain-text formatting syntax that can be converted to 'XHTML' or other formats. See <http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown> for more information about Markdown.

name: r-markdown
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "2.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-markdown
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/markdown_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/markdown/markdown_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: a560de75fb6878901e38febfef3ea8d21cb63af63de0e583019867d189bf9541

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}  # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - {{ posix }}zip             # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-litedown >=0.6
    - r-xfun
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-litedown >=0.6
    - r-xfun

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('markdown')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('markdown')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/rstudio/markdown
  license: MIT
  summary: Provides R bindings to the 'Sundown' Markdown rendering library (<https://github.com/vmg/sundown>). Markdown is a plain-text formatting syntax that can be converted to 'XHTML' or other formats. See <http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown> for more information about Markdown.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'
    - LICENSE
    
extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
